Speaker: episode vii
Dialogue: THE FORCE AWAKENS

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Well, because of you now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: BB-8 ENTERS FRANTIC, BEEPS. Concerned, Poe turns to Lor San Tekka.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: You have to hide.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Come on, BB-8! Hurry! Poe sends BB-8 into the droid socket / co-pilot seat -- he moves to the cockpit -- the CONTROLS COME TO LIFE. As the CANOPY CLOSES, Poe shoots a quick look back: the ENEMY ARRIVES

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: You take this. It's safer with you than it is with me. You get as far away from here as you can. Do you hear me?  I'll come back for you! It will be alright.

Speaker: senior trooper
Dialogue: Stay here. Our Trooper nods. Kylo Ren stops before the outraged Lor San Tekka, dwarfing him. Only now does it become apparent that Kylo Ren wears a DARK MASK, marked by battle. Inset metal lines reflect FIRE.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Look how old you've become.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: You know what I've come for.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: The map to Skywalker. We know you've found it, and now you're going to give it to the First Order. Adjacent to the village, Poe enters frame -- sees the Ren/San Tekka exchange continue.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I'll show you the dark side.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: You're so right. And as he RIPS IT DOWN ACROSS SAN TEKKA! Poe, RUNNING, SEES THIS AND YELLS, AIMS HIS BLASTER AND FIRES AT KYLO REN! Instantly: Kylo Ren RAISES HIS HAND -- POE'S BLAST FREEZES -- THE BOLT

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: So who talks first? You talk first?

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: The old man gave it to you.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: ... Apparatus. The Troopers roughly pull Poe away. A Stormtrooper begins a brutal PAT DOWN. Kylo Ren moves closer. Poe just glares as the pat down ends.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Put him on board. Kylo Ren regards the Stormtroopers with the rounded up Villagers, then turns to the CHROME-SKINNED, FEMALE BLACK-

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: Sir, the villagers.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Kill them all. Phasma nods, steps forward:

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: On my command! The Troopers, including OURS, aim at the Villagers.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: All right. All right! Our Stormtrooper passes, moves fast:

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: FN-2187. Submit your blaster for inspection.

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: And who gave you permission to remove that helmet?

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: Report to my division at once.

Speaker: unkar
Dialogue: What you've brought me today is worth... Hmmm... One quarter portion. Though disappointed, Rey barely shows it. She nods thanks. Unkar pushes through his transfer drawer a SEALED PACKET: DRIED GREEN MEAT in one section, BEIGE POWDER in another. She takes it. She swallows her resentment and heads off.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Tal'ama parqual! The Teedo and BB-8 STOP, GO SILENT, turn to her.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I had no idea we had the best pilot in the Resistance on board. Comfortable? Through battered lips:

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Not really.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I'm impressed. No one has been able to get out of you what you did with the map.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Might wanna rethink your technique. Kylo Ren says nothing, reaches out to him. Poe flinches in the chair as Kylo Ren reaches for his face, not touching him. Poe is soon in agony, remains in horrible silence --

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Where is it?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Where... is it? Poe can't take it -- he BEGINS TO SCREAM and we CUT TO:

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: It's in a droid. A BB unit.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Well then. If it's on Jakku, we'll soon have it.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I leave that to you.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Don't give up. He still might show up. Whoever it is you're waiting for. Classified. I know all about waiting. BB-8 BEEPTALKS a question.

Speaker: unkar
Dialogue: These five pieces are worth... Let me see here... One half portion.

Speaker: unkar
Dialogue: What about the droid?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What about him?

Speaker: unkar
Dialogue: I'll pay for him. BB-8 doesn't like this at all. Rey is awkward, but curious.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Actually... the droid's not for sale.

Speaker: unkar
Dialogue: Follow the girl and get that droid. He SLAMS the service window door SHUT.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Ren wants the prisoner. TIGHT ON POE, in pain, drained, as the Guard unshackles him.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Turn here. Poe turns into a narrow passageway --

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Listen carefully: you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: You with the Resistance--?!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I can fly anything. Why, why are you helping me?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: You need a pilot.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: We're gonna do this.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I am calm.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I always wanted to fly one of these things. Can ya shoot?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Okay, same principal! Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse -- use the site on the right to aim, triggers to fire!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I can fix this.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I got it!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Woooahhh! This thing really moves. All right, we gotta take out as many cannons as we can or we're not gonna get very far!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I'm gonna get us in position, just stay sharp!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Up ahead! Up ahead! You see it? I've got us dead centered. It's a clean shot.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I saw it! Hey, what's your name?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: FN-whaa?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Well I ain't using it! FN, huh? Finn. I'm gonna call you Finn! That all right? Even in the madness, Finn can't suppress his smile.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: "Finn." Yeah, "Finn", I like that! I like that!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I'm Poe. Poe Dameron.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Good to meet you, Poe!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Good to meet you too, Finn!

Speaker: lieutenant mitaka
Dialogue: Sir, they've taken out our turbolasers--

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Use the ventral cannons.

Speaker: lieutenant mitaka
Dialogue: Yes, sir. Bringing them online --

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Yes, and he had help.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: ... The one from the village. FN-

Speaker: lieutenant mitaka
Dialogue: Sir. Ventral cannons hot.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Fire.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: One's coming towards you. My right, your left. Do you see it?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Hold on! I see it!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Nice shot. Finn looks up suddenly in alarm --

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Where are you going?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: We're going back to Jakku. That's where.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: No no no! We can't go back to Jakku! We need to get outta this system! NEAR-MISS LASER BLASTS as Poe pilots aggressively.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I got to get to my droid before the First Order does!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: What - a droid?!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: That's right. He's a BB unit! Orange and white: one of a kind.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: This one is, pal.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We need to get as far away from the First Order as we can! We go back to Jakku, we die!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: That droid's got a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Oh, you gotta be kidding me!!! I-- Suddenly BAM! THEY ARE HIT!

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: FN-2187 reported to my division, was evaluated and sent to Reconditioning.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: No prior signs of non-conformity?

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: This was his first offense. A technician checks her readings, reports to General Hux.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Destroyed?

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: They were going back for the droid -- send a squad to the wreckage.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Poe! Poe! Finn scrambles over the massive dune to the TIE FIGHTER, SMOKING AND ON FIRE, small debris around it. He thinks he sees POE'S ARM -- he pulls on it, but it's JUST POE'S JACKET. He throws that off and tries to find a way in -- even a way to LOOK INSIDE, but the smoke and heat make it impossible.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit. Capture the droid if we can, but destroy it if we must.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: How capable are your soldiers, General?

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: They're obviously skilled at committing high treason. Perhaps Leader Snoke should consider using a clone army.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Then they should have no problem retrieving the droid. Unharmed.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Careful, Ren. That your "personal interests" not interfere with orders from Leader Snoke.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I want that map. For your sake, I suggest you get it. Ren heads off. Hux hates him.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Water... water... water.. He sees a WATER TROUGH where a filthy, slobbering hippo-like creature  DRINKS. Finn moves to it, uses his hands to desperately DRINK the filthy water. After a couple swallows he SPITS IT OUT, disgusted.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Who? Him? Finn is confused. Rey stands, staring at Finn, defiant. Finn can feel trouble coming -- and Rey begins CHARGING AT HIM, quarterstaff in hand. Realizing he's the target, Finn begins to RUN -- away from her, through the tent marketplace. Rey goes after him -- he turns a corner -- then another -- then BAM! She's got ahead of him and SLAMS HIM TO THE GROUND WITH HER STAFF! Finn is on his back, out of breath and freaked out. She holds the staff on him threateningly:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What's your hurry, thief?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: What--?! Thief? BB-8 ROLLS UP FAST, MOVES TO FINN -- a WELDING ARM TELESCOPES

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: The jacket! This droid says you stole it!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I've had a pretty messed up day, alright?! So I'd appreciate it you stop accusing me -- OW!!! (BB-8 has ZAPPED him

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Where'd you get it? It belongs to his master. Finn looks at her -- then the agitated droid, Finn's mind racing. He puts it all together. Frustrated, but sighs heavily, needing to respond somehow. So he makes a hard decision: to tell the truth.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: It belonged to Poe Dameron. That was his name, right? Rey and BB-8 react, surprised and wanting more.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: So you're with the Resistance?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Obviously. Yes. I am. I'm with the Resistance, yeah.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I've never met a Resistance fighter before.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Well, this is what we look like. Some of us. Others look different.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: BB-8 says he's on a secret mission, he has to get back to your base.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Apparently he's carrying a map that leads to Luke Skywalker, and everyone's after it. She turns to him, concerned, curious. And asks:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Luke Skywalker? I thought he was a myth. Just then BB-8 BEEPS MADLY at something he sees.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Come on! Suddenly LASER BLASTS RIP PAST THEM, HIT THE CLEANING UNIT, SPEWING STEAM! Rey SCREAMS -- MORE BLASTS as they run!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Come on, BB-8!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Let go of me!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: No, we gotta move!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I know how to run without you holding my hand! BB-8 stay close! This way! Now Finn and BB-8 follow Rey -- ANOTHER BLAST just missing them! They disappear through a tent. TRACK FAST WITH STORMTROOPERS, through the tent maze. They come out of a tent, HAVING MOMENTARILY LOST THEIR TARGET.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Call in the air strike! REY, FINN AND BB-8 duck into another tent:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: They're shooting at both of us!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Yeah, they saw you with me! You're marked!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Well, thanks for that!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I'm not the one who chased you down with a stick! Does anyone have blasters around here?!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Hey! As Finn comes to, he sees her. Through his fog:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: -- Are you okay? And that very question touches her -- having never in her life been asked it.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Yeah.  Follow me. Grateful, Finn takes it. They're off. LOCALS run amok as TIE fighters DIVE BOMB. REY, Finn and BB-

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We can't outrun them! Rey POINTS to a parked, four-engine SHIP ahead:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: We might in that quad-jumper!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We need a pilot!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: We've got one!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You?! (then, indicates one

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: That one's garbage! They run for the JUMPER but the passing TIE FIGHTERS FIRE AT IT, BLOWING IT APART IN A HUGE FLAME BALL! Rey, coming to a quick stop, RIGHT UP TO CAMERA:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Gunner position's down there!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: No! This ship hasn't been flown in years!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Great.  Whoa! I can do this, I can do this--

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I can do this, I can do this-- Rey pulls the yoke:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Whoa! Hey! Oh! Stay low! Stay low!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Stay low! It confuses their tracking! For a crazy instant Rey LETS GO OF THE YOKE, stretches to the co-pilot controls -- THE FALCON CANTS!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: BB-8, hold on! Rey finally REACHES the switches, returns to the yoke, stabilizing the ship, afraid of this next move.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What are you doing back there? Are you ever gonna fire back?!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I'm working on it! Are the shields up? Rey strains, reaching for something in the co-pilot seat.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Not so easy without a co-pilot! Finn struggles with the gun controls and SWEEPING CHAIR:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Try sitting in this thing! Finn finally FIRES BACK at the two TIE FIGHTERS!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We need cover, quick!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: We're about to get some!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Damn it! Rey maneuvers the ship deeper into the graveyard.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Come on... come on... -- HITS AND SHATTERS the TIE FIGHTER!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Nice shot!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I'm getting pretty good at this!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: The cannon's stuck in forward position, I can't move it! You gotta lose 'em!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Get ready!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Okay! For what?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Oh no! Just as the TIE PILOT GETS A LOCK, Rey YANKS THE YOKE --

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Whooo! The Falcon ROARS OFF, victorious, leaving the ship graveyard and disappearing into the clouds.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Finn. What's yours.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I'm Rey. BB-8 looks at him: really? Finn is reminded: HE'S LIED TO HER. She looks at Finn with a sweet smile.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Rey... But before Finn can say anything they JUMP: across the lounge, STEAM BURSTS from under the grating.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Help me with this! Quick! They hurry to the grating, PULL IT UP together. BB-8 rolls over, watches.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Whoa! What's going on? She goes below as BB-8 BEEPS concern.

Speaker: lieutenant mitaka
Dialogue: Sir. We were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku. Ren turns to look at him, he says nothing.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: The droid... stole a freighter?

Speaker: lieutenant mitaka
Dialogue: Not exactly, sir. It had help. Ren says nothing. Which says everything. Mitaka sweats.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Anything else? Mitaka hates to say the following, but:

Speaker: lieutenant mitaka
Dialogue: The two were accompanied by a girl. Ren reaches out -- Mitaka is suddenly, violently PULLED TOWARD REN, into his black glove:

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: What girl?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: It's the motivator! Grab me a Harris wrench -- check in there! As he checks a storage box, she disappears down below, overwhelmed by the technical issues --

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: How bad is it?!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: If we wanna live, not good! BB-8 watches as Finn searches A SELECTION OF TOOLS:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: They're hunting for us now, we gotta get outta this system! Rey re-emerges, Finn hands her the wrench.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: BB-8 said the location of the Resistance Base is "need to know" -- if I'm taking you there, I need to know!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: This? She catches it and goes under again, leaving Finn and BB-8 alone. He contemplates telling her the truth. This is his moment. But instead he knees to BB-8, says quietly, urgently:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Pilex driver, hurry! Finn moves for the tool.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Go on BB-8, tell her.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: The Ileenium system? Finn hands her the tool, surprised but thrilled -- Rey disappears below again.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Yeah, the Ileenium system, that's the one -- get us there as fast as you can. A smiling Finn gives BB-8 a THUMBS UP. BB-8 quickly extends his WELDING TORCH and TURNS IT UPWARD, then retracts it.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I'll drop you two at Ponemah Terminal. I need the bonding tape, hurry!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: What about you?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I gotta get back to Jakku!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: BACK TO JAK--?! Why does everyone always wanna go back to Jakku?! !

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: No, that one! No. No. The one I'm pointing to! No. NO. NO. If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas! Bb-8 has moved to Finn -- TIPS HIS HEAD, shows him the tool. He throws her the tape, she disappears below:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: This?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Yes!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Hey. Rey. You're a pilot -- you can fly anywhere! Why go back?! You got a family? You got a boyfriend? Cute boyfriend? The STEAM and ALARM STOP as Rey pops up, annoyed:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: None of your business, THAT'S WHY! But then: ALL THE SHIP POWER GOES OUT. BB-8 is nervous.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: ... That can't be good.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Someone's locked onto us -- all controls are overridden. Finn quickly, awkwardly climbs up, looks out.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: ... Oh no.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: It's the First Order.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What do we do-- there must be

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You said poisonous gas --

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: -- Yeah, but I fixed that --

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Can you unfix it? Rey stares at him -- and gets his plan! They head off --

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: C'mon BB-8. They help BB-8 down, too: they both struggle like crazy, he weighs a TON.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I got it.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Oooh...

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I'm okay. BB-8 get off me...

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You think this'll work on the Stormtroopers?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Yeah. Their masks filter out smoke, not toxins. LIGHTS COME ON! SOUND of the SHIP RAMP LOWERING! Finn PULLS THE GRATING CLOSED as he says:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I'm hurrying! Suddenly the FALCON DOOR OPENS -- AND HAN SOLO AND CHEWBACCA BOARD THE FALCON, weapons at the ready. PUSH IN ON THEM, ready for combat, operating silently, with hand signals only.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie, we're home. Han gives Chewie a nod to check out the ship. Chewie heads off one way, Han in another. The grating above LIFTS OFF -- hands in surrender, they look up at Han, who's training his blaster on them, threatening. They're SCARED.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: ...I'm the pilot...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You? Chewie MOAN-TALKS. Rey responds to him --

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: No, it's true: we're the only ones on board.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You can understand that thing?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: And "that thing" can understand you too, so watch it. Come on outta there. They climb up -- BB-8 uses his magnetic arm to quickly pull himself out.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Niima Outpost.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Jakku?! That junkyard?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Thank you! Junkyard!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I stole it from Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Who stole it from me! Well, you tell him Han Solo just stole back the Millennium Falcon for good. Han walks away, takes in the ship: it's his again. Doesn't see that Rey is awed. His back to all of them, he smiles. Chewie responds as Han heads toward the cockpit.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I used to be.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Han Solo? The Rebellion General?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: No, the smuggler!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs...!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Twelve! Fourteen. A moment of private joy. Then he sees something that ANNOYS

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake too, puts too much stress on

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Wait! No -- we need your help!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: My help?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker. Yup: Han stops in his tracks.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yeah, I knew him. I knew Luke. Suddenly: a distant, METALLIC KA-CHUNK!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Wait -- a what?! Did you just say Rathtars? Hey!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm hauling Rathtars. On the CONTROL PANEL: IMAGES ON SCREENS FROM ALL AROUND THE SHIP. Including the EXTERIOR, where a TRANSPORT SHIP is LANDING ON THE FREIGHTER. Han is fearful.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What's a Rathtar?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Y'ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Good. They turn a corner:

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I got three of 'em going to King Prana.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: THREE?! How'd you get them on board?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I used to have a bigger crew. Chewie GROAN-TALKS, concurring.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Get below deck and stay there until I say so -- don't even think about taking the Falcon.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What about BB-8?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: He stays with me -- until I get rid of the gang, then you can have him back and be on your way.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: What about the Rathtars... where are you keeping them? A TERRIFYING BAM: a GROTESQUE RATHTAR GIANT TONGUE SLAMS into the CARGO CONTAINER window behind Finn, whose heart stops.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There's one.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What are you gonna do?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Same thing I always do: talk my way out of it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Bala-Tik. What's the problem?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Can you see them?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: No. They start crawling down the crawl space.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You know you can't trust those little freaks! How long've we known each other? Rey and Finn arrive under the gang. They WHISPER:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: They have blasters...

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: A lot of 'em. We RISE THROUGH THE FLOOR to see the GANG and Han and company in the distance.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Ya think hunting Rathtars is cheap? I spent that money.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I never made a deal with Kanjiklub!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Tasu Leech. Good to see you. Tasu speaks an alien language, we SUBTITLE:

Speaker: tasu leech
Dialogue: Wrong again, Solo. It's over for you. Tasu COCKS HIS WEAPON, there for blood. BB-8 is nervous. Finn and Rey react to the sounds of the new gang -- start CRAWLING BACK the other way to see them.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Boys. You're both gonna get what I promised! Have I ever not delivered for you before?

Speaker: tasu leech
Dialogue: Twice! Han realizes he's right.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What was the second time?

Speaker: tasu leech
Dialogue: Nowhere left for you to hide.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: First I've heard of it. Below the grating, Finn and Rey look at each other, afraid. Above, another Kanjiklubber :

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Wait wait wait wait. If we close the blast doors in that corridor, we can trap both gangs!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Close the blast doors from here?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Resetting the fuses should do it. Rey begins RESETTING the FUSES, SPARKS shooting from them as they do. Finn quickly joins in. Rey and Finn FINISH resetting the fuses boxes. Rey smiles optimistically. Finn looks hopeful too. DOWN AN EMPTY ROW OF LARGE CONTAINERS, which OPEN -- and a GIANT RATHTAR -- an ENORMOUS, FIERCE AND RAVENOUS LAND OCTOPUS --

Speaker: han
Dialogue: ... I got a bad feeling about this... Suddenly all the LIGHTS COME ON AGAIN -- even down below, where Rey realizes it hasn't gone as planned.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Oh no.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Oh no, what?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: This was a mistake!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Huge!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What do they look like?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: They look like that. Finn yanks her away. They race around another corner -- a

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Are you sure? They scream and run off -- but Finn is GRABBED, PULLED AWAY

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Finn!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: It had me! But the door--!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: That was lucky! ANOTHER CORRIDOR - Finn and Rey run towards the Falcon.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I got the door. Cover us! Chewie GROAN-AGREES. Chewie FIRES DOWN THE HALL as Han CROSSES THE CORRIDOR, BB-8 following nervously. As Chewie exchanges blaster fire, Han works the controls. THE HATCH OPENS  -- just as CHEWIE IS HIT IN THE SHOULDER BY ENEMY FIRE! He goes down with a

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Han! Finn and Rey race past BB-8 -- as they go up the ramp, Han says to Rey:

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You, close the door behind us!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, where are you going?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump too -- if we don't prime that we're not going anywhere.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I hate that guy. Han sits as, Rey hitting buttons:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: And you could use a co-pilot.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I got one, he's back there.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed --

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I never ask that question until after I've done it. A RATHTAR JUMPS ONTO THE WINDSHIELD -- REY SCREAMS! Its GIANT MOUTH CHEWING AT THE GLASS! Han works the controls:

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on baby, don't let me down! He hits a switch -- but NOTHING.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Compressor. Han doesn't like it but she's right -- he hits the switch again and the HYPERDRIVE FIRES! The hangar is FILLED WITH LIGHTSPEED BLAST as the ATTACKING GANG MEMBERS ARE BLASTED BACK LIKE DRY LEAVES. In the cockpit the RATHTAR RIPS AWAY as THE STARS STRETCH LIKE ELASTIC and we CUT TO:

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: ... Leading them to the last Jedi. If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Supreme Leader, I take full responsibility for th--

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: General! Our strategy must now change.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: The weapon. It is ready. I believe the time has come to use it. We shall destroy the government that supports the Resistance, the Republic. Without their friends to protect them, the Resistance will be vulnerable, and we will stop them before they reach Skywalker. Snoke considers. Almost seems to die for a moment. Then:

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: Go. Oversee preparations.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Yes, Supreme Leader. General Hux, proud, cocksure, exits. Kylo Ren watches him go. Snoke SITS. A new intimacy in his voice.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: There's been an awakening. Have you felt it?

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: There's something more. The droid we seek is aboard the Millennium Falcon. In the hands of your father, Han Solo. Kylo Ren reacts with subtle, but real, surprise.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: He means nothing to me.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: Even you, master of the Knights of Ren, have never faced such a test.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: We shall see. We shall see. A gentle, satisfied nod from Snoke, and Kylo Ren, obsessed, filled up, exits. Snoke watches him disappear, a grotesque evil SMILE growing -- as he DISINTEGRATES -- Snoke has been a HOLOGRAM all along.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Electrical overload!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I can fix that!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The coolant's leaking!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Try transferring auxiliary power to the secondary tank--

Speaker: han
Dialogue: -- Secondary tank, I got it!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Chewie, come on! I need help with this giant hairy thing! Stop moving! Chewie!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You hurt Chewie, you're gonna deal with me!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Hurt him?! He almost killed me six times!  Which is fine.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: This hyperdrive blows there's gonna be pieces of us in three different systems. Han at the controls when all the alarms STOP. Rey, satisfied, sits in the co-pilot seat. Han is confused.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I by-passed the compressor. He looks at her. A little, appreciative laugh. Han exits,

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Move, Ball.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Nah, don't say that, you did great. Just rest. Han turns to Finn, who sits at the HOLOCHESS set, BB-8 beside him. This is awkward for Han, but damn, he means it:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You're welcome. Finn has accidentally hit a button on the chess set, and the PIECES appear, looking up at Finn, curiously. The pieces start to FIGHT as Finn fiddles with the controls, trying to turn it off.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: So, fugitives, huh?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: The First Order wants the map.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Let's see whatcha got.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared, people have been looking for him.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Why'd he leave?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice turned against him, destroyed it all. Luke felt responsible... He walked away from everything.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Do you know what happened to him?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There're a lot of rumors. Stories. The people who knew him the best think he went looking for the first Jedi temple.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: The Jedi were real?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I used to wonder that myself. Thought it was a bunch of mumbo-jumbo -- magical power holding together good, evil, the dark side and the light.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Hey, Solo -- I'm not sure what we're walking into here --

Speaker: han
Dialogue: D'you just call me "Solo"?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Sorry. Han-- Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real target on my back. Are there any conspirators here? First Order sympathizers?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Listen big deal, you've got another problem. Women always figure out the truth. Hands him a BLASTER.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You might need this.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I think I can handle myself.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I know you do. That's why I'm giving it to you. Take it. Rey picks it up. Grips it.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Yeah, you pull the trigger.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There's a little bit more to it than that. You got a lot to learn. You got a name?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Rey.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Rey. I've been thinkin' about bringing on some more crew, Rey. A second mate. Someone to help out. Someone who can keep up with Chewie and me, appreciates the Falcon.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Are you offering me a job?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I wouldn't be nice to you. It doesn't pay much.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You're offering me a job.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm thinking about it. Rey wants to say yes. But something stops her. A line she can't cross.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: If you were, I'd be flattered. But I have to get home. Han looks at her, questioningly.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Jakku? Rey looks off, in thought. Yeah, Jakku.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Solo, why are we here again?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: To get your droid on a clean ship.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Clean?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Do you think it was luck that Chewie and I found the Falcon? If we can find it on our scanners, the First Order's not far behind. Want to get BB-8 to the Resistance? Maz Kanata is our best bet.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We can trust her, right?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Relax, kid. She's run this watering hole for a thousand years. Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking. And whatever you do, don't stare...

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Any of it. The door opens. Music. Madness. And...

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Han Solo! Everyone turns to look. It's ALL QUIET in here.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, Maz! NOISE returns. Maz walks to them, pushes someone away.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Where's my boyfriend?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie's working on the Falcon.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: I like that Wookiee. I assume you need something. Desperately. Let's get to it.

Speaker: bazine
Dialogue: Inform the First Order... I've found the droid.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Forgive me. I feel it again. The pull to the light. Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again, the power of the darkness, and I will let nothing stand in our way. Show me, Grandfather, and I will finish what you started. As his emotion builds, he stands and heads off -- we FOLLOW HIM, PIVOTING TO REVEAL who he was talking to: THE BURNT,

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: A map to Skywalker himself? You're right back in the mess.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Maz, I need you to get this droid to Leia.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Hmm. No. You've been running away from this fight for too long. Han, nyakee nago wadda. Go home!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Leia doesn't want to see me.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Please, we came here for your help.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What fight?

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: The only fight: against the dark side. Through the ages, I've seen evil take many forms. The Sith. The Empire. Today, it is the First Order. Their shadow is spreading across the galaxy. We must face them. Fight them. All of us.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: There is no fight against the First Order! Not one we can win. Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already. I bet you the First Order is on their way right-- Finn stops, seeing Maz adjusting her goggles, scrutinizing him -- her eyes get HUGE.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I don't know, but it ain't good.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: If you live long enough you see the same eyes in different people. I'm looking at the eyes of a man who wants to run.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You don't know a thing about me. Where I'm from. What I've seen.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear. Finn sees them. Considers.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Finn!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Come with me.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What about BB-8? We're not done yet. We have to get him back to your base.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I can't. Finn stands to leave. He offers the gun back to Han.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Keep it, kid. Finn heads off. Rey gets up to follow. Maz dials her lenses back to normal, and turns to Han.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Who's the girl?

Speaker: on finn
Dialogue: Who has arrived at the table with the ALIEN SMUGGLERS.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I was told you could get me to the Outer Rim. Rey barges into the conversation, interrupting.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What are you doing? Finn gets up to talk to her.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Don't leave without me.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You can't just go. I won't let you.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I'm not who you think I am.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Finn, what are you talking about?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero. I'm a Stormtrooper.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Don't go.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Take care of yourself. Please. Rey looks at him, crushed. With quiet resignation, Rey watches Finn return to the aliens... And all three head off. He gets to the front door and walks through it. Rey is heartsick, but she turns as she hears the sound of a young girl in anguish, crying. She follows the sound into the castle, turning so she can't see that Finn has looked back at her one last time.

Speaker: young girl
Dialogue: No, come back!

Speaker: unkar plutt
Dialogue: Quiet, girl! The ship flies towards the desert sun, which is strangely eclipsed, as if being eaten by darkness. Rey looks around her to see she is.. In a NIGHTTIME, BARREN, SNOWY WOODS. She's losing her mind, confounded and lost and she gets to her feet, her breath seen in the frigid air -- and then: THE SOUND OF CLASHING LIGHTSABERS! She moves through the woods, toward the sound. Rey runs, heart pounding, when KYLO REN EMERGES FROM BEHIND A TREE! She stops, SCREAMS, FALLS BACK and LANDS IN:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What was that? I shouldn't have gone in there.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: That lightsaber was Luke's. And his father's before him and now, it calls to you! Rey stands, fast. Still overwhelmed, emotional, speechless.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I have to get back to Jakku.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Han told me. (reaches out, hold

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Luke.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: The belonging you seek is not behind you. It is ahead. I am no Jedi, but I know the Force. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes. Feel it.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I'm never touching that again. I don't want any part of this. And Rey runs off, passing Maz. Rey's mind is spinning -- she can't take it -- she turns and heads off, fast. BB-8 follows her. TIGHT ON MAZ, watching her go. Maz SIGHS, feeling for the young girl.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Today is the end of the Republic! The end of a regime that acquiesces to disorder! At this very moment, in a system far from here the New Republic LIES to the GALAXY while secretly supporting the treachery of the loathsome Resistance. This fierce machine which you have built, upon which we stand, will bring an end to the Senate! To their cherished fleet! All remaining systems will bow to the First Order! And will remember this... as the last day of the Republic!

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: FIRE! And Hux TURNS to give the signal as we CUT BACK WIDE -- a ROAR OF BOOTS ON PAVEMENT as the thousand Stormtroopers TURN to face an endless snowy landscape. WHAT IS ABOUT TO HAPPEN?!  EXT. STARKILLER BASE - DAY  A view PAST THE RALLY. For a moment, nothing. Then, eerily  SILENT, AN IMPOSSIBLE BLAST OF FIRE LIGHT -- LIKE AN ATOMIC  BOMB TEST TIMES A ZILLION -- BLASTS FROM MILES AWAY, INTO THE SKY! Seconds later, a TERRIBLE EXPLOSIVE ROAR! The Troopers -- everyone -- is nearly PUSHED BACK by the FORCE of it -- the magnitude! Many have to COVER THEIR EYES! For MILES around the FIREBEAM, ICE AND SNOW MELTS INSTANTLY! Runoff tunnels FLOODED with AN OCEAN OF FRESH WATER. AIRBORNE CREATURES by the thousands burst from trees and take flight. Hux watches, his eyes WILD WITH POWER AND EVIL. From HIS eyes, CUT TO:  INT. STAR DESTROYER BRIDGE - DAY  TIGHT ON KYLO REN as he watches the Starkiller firing.  EXT. MAZ' CASTLE - DAY  Finn boards the Alien Freighter. The SOUND FROM THE SKY makes him turn back. He sees the PATH OF FIRE and his blood runs cold, his heart sinks.  EXT. REPUBLIC SYSTEM - NIGHT  At a massive distance we see PLANETS THE REPUBLIC CAPITAL  SYSTEM -- INCREASINGLY LIT, THEN POWERFULLY HIT BY THE VAST  FIREBLAST WHICH OBLITERATES IT ALL!  EXT. REPUBLIC CITY - NIGHT  The galaxy CENTER OF GOVERNMENT at NIGHT. Impressive structures. Senators and dignitaries look in uncomprehending horror to the night sky. LIGHT GROWING -- FROM A GREAT DISTANCE a CIRCLE OF FIRE -- LIKE A SMALL SUN  APPEARING FROM NOWHERE AND GROWING CLOSE AND MASSIVE, TURNING NIGHT TO DAY! And in seconds THE FIRE BLOCKS OUT EVERYTHING  ELSE, AND THE ENTIRE PLANET OF HOSNIAN PRIME IS INCINERATED!  EXT. MAZ'S CASTLE - DAY  A crowd of ALIENS files out from inside, all eyes on the FIRE IN THE SKY. Dozens of LANGUAGES exclaiming fear and horror. Find Han and Chewie moving out, looking up.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: I've had this for ages...

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Kept it locked away.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Where'd you get that?

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: A good question for another time.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: FN-417, hold position! Rey takes cover, grabs her BLASTER -- but IT WON'T FIRE! She panics, then realizes:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Safety! SHE SWITCHES OFF THE SAFETY and FIRES BACK! HITS TWO TROOPERS and retreats, calls to BB-8: BB-8 follows Rey AWAY FROM THE CASTLE, firing back at more chasing Troopers!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You have to keep going, stay out of sight, I'll try to fight 'em off.  I hope so, too. BB-8 BEEPS and heads off -- Rey RUNS and TAKES COVER behind a massive, mossy tree. TIGHT on her TERRIFIED FACE --

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Come on, Chewie! Maz turns to Finn:

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: Rey and BB-8, they need you. Now go.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I need a weapon. Maz grabs his wrist -- holds up his hand -- THE SABER.

Speaker: maz
Dialogue: You have one! He looks at her questioningly -- he's supposed to use the lightsaber?! He TURNS IT ON. HAN AND CHEWIE RUN, TAKE COVER from BLASTS, FIRING BACK at Stormtroopers, taking some out!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Hey, can I try that? Han borrows Chewbacca's bowcaster, fires on Stormtroopers and sends them flying.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Traitor! FINN and the TROOPER WITH THE MACE battle. The Mace Trooper KNOCKS FINN DOWN! The Stormtrooper is about to end him, when THE STORMTROOPER IS SHOT AND FALLS! Wide-eyed Finn sees Han run over, having fired the blast! Han helps him up.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You okay, Big deal?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Thanks! But TEN STORMTROOPERS come over a RISE, BLASTERS AIMED.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Don't move! TK-338, we have targets in custody!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It's the Resistance. One X-WING in particular -- MARKED IN BLACK -- SWOOPS DOWN and takes out the parked TIE FIGHTERS and Troopers!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Go straight ahead and don't let these dogs scare you!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Quick! Chewie picks up his Bowcaster, Han takes the blaster. Shoots a Trooper.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Woohoo! YEAH! That's one helluva pilot!

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: The girl I've heard so much about. He walks AROUND HER, slowly, she won't let herself cry.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Request air support!

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: The map. You've seen it. Rey is horrified. He TOUCHES HER FACE again: the pain, tears stream. Kylo Ren, taking more from her mind... She stares at him, TERRIFIED, straining in agony -- Kylo Ren, mid-interrogation, TURNS TOWARD THE SOUND OF THE EXPLOSIONS. Stormtroopers APPROACH through the woods.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Pull the division out. Forget the droid. We have what we need. A GESTURE from Kylo Ren and REY LOSES CONSCIOUSNESS, FALLS

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Pull back the tree line! Han and Chewie dodge debris, FIRING and TAKING OUT TROOPERS. FINN takes out 2 TROOPERS with the blaster, then, out of breath, turns to see: Kylo Ren in the forest, CARRYING REY IN HIS ARMS, INTO HIS SHUTTLE! Finn's heart SHATTERS -- Han stops -- turns -- sees Kylo Ren entering his shuttle. Han is ROCKED.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: He took her! Did you see that? He took her. She's gone!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You changed your hair.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Same jacket.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No, new jacket. Chewie glad to see Leia, greets her with a hug. Chewie MOANS a few words, looks at Han then boards the ship. It is complicated and loving and painful. Han says, quietly:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Poe. Poe Dameron. They move to each other -- and embrace.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: So are you!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: What happened to you?

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: What happened? I got thrown from the crash, woke up at night -- no you, no ship, nothing-- BB-8 BEEPS -- Poe listens, turns to Finn.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: No, no, no. It wasn't just me.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: You completed my mission, Finn. That's my jacket?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Oh here.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: No, no, no. Keep it. It suits you. You're a good man, Finn.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Poe -- I need your help.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: General Organa. Sorry to interrupt, this is Finn, he needs to talk to

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: And I need to talk to him. That was incredibly brave, what you did. Renouncing the First Order, saving this man's life --

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Thank you, ma'am -- but a friend of mine was taken prisoner--

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han told me about the girl, I'm sorry. Finn is startled -- Poe jumps in:

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Finn's familiar with the weapon that destroyed the Hosnian system. He worked on the base.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: We're desperate for anything you can tell us.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: That's where my friend was taken -- I've got to get there, fast.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: And I will do everything I can to help, but first you must tell us all you know.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I can't believe I was so foolish to think that I could just find Luke and bring him home.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Leia...

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Don't do that.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Do what? She heads off.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Anything. Flummoxed, Han follows looking at C-3PO.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I'm trying to be helpful!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: When did that ever help? And don't say the Death Star.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Listen to me, will you? I know every time you... every time you look at me, you're reminded of him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: You think I want to forget him? I want him back! Han looks at her with sympathy.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: There was nothing we could've done.  There was too much Vader in him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: That's why I wanted him to train with Luke. I just never should have sent him away. That's when I lost him. That's when I lost you both.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We both had to deal with it in our own way. I went back to the only thing I was ever good at.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: We both did.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We lost our son, forever.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: If Luke couldn't reach him, how could

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Luke is a Jedi... you're his father. There's still light in him. I know it.

Speaker: general statura
Dialogue: General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Where am I?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Where are the others?

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: You mean the murderers, traitors and thieves you call friends?  You'll be relieved to hear that I have no idea.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask. Kylo Ren stops, considers her... then reaches up, unlatches and REMOVES HIS MASK. Rey reacts, stunned. It takes a moment before she regains her own mask of defiance.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Tell me about the droid.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: He's a BB unit with a selenium drive and a thermal hyperscan vindicator --

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: He's carrying a section of a navigational chart. We have the rest, recovered from archives of the Empire. We need the last piece. And somehow, you convinced the droid to show it to you. You. A scavenger -- Rey reacts -- afraid -- how does he know?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: -- Get out of my head -- But this just makes Kylo lean closer.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I know you've seen the map. It's in there... and now you'll give it to me. Don't be afraid. I feel it too. Where her strength comes from, she doesn't know, but:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I'm not giving you anything.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: We'll see. He peers into her eyes intensely. She meets his gaze --

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: ... You... you're afraid... that you will never be as strong as... Darth Vader! KYLO REN SUDDENLY WITHDRAWS HIS HAND, as if her face were FIRE HOT. TAKES A STEP BACK, CONFUSED, RATTLED. Rey's body is released, she breathes deeply, her powerful eyes still on Kylo Ren, who starts to leave. And we PRELAP:

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: She's strong with the Force, untrained but, stronger than she knows. And while Ren's mind no doubt goes to Luke:

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: And the droid?

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: Then the Resistance must be destroyed before they get to Skywalker.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: We have their location. We tracked their reconnaissance ship to the Ileenium system.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: Good. Then we will crush them once and for all. Prepare the weapon. Kylo Ren is stunned by the moment -- that isn't what he meant at all --

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Supreme Leader. I can get the map from the girl. I just need your guidance.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: If what you say about this girl is true, bring her to me.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. The Stormtrooper Guard looks at her. A beat.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. The Stormtrooper Guard, rifle aimed, MOVES FOR HER. Rey's heart pounds -- is she about to be killed, freed, or laughed at? The tension unbearable when the Guard says:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: And you will drop your weapon.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Begin charging the weapon!

Speaker: starkiller technician
Dialogue: Yes, sir. Weapon charging.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.

Speaker: snap
Dialogue: They've somehow created a hyper lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.

Speaker: brance
Dialogue: A laser cannon?

Speaker: snap
Dialogue: We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I wish that were the case, Major. Poe hits a control. A WIREFRAME OF THE DEATH STAR APPEARS.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: So it's big.

Speaker: admiral ackbar
Dialogue: How is it possible to power a weapon of this size?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged, the sun is drained until it disappears. An OFFICER runs up, hands Leia a DATACARD.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Our system is the next target.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Okay, how do we blow it up?  There's always a way to do that.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han's right. Han is surprised.

Speaker: admiral statura
Dialogue: In order for that amount of power to be contained, that base would need some kind of thermal oscillator...

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: There is one. All eyes on Finn as he moves around the hologram to a location on the Starkiller Base -- it is ZOOMED IN: A GIANT BLACK

Speaker: major ematt
Dialogue: ... Maybe the planet. Poe then tries to bolster spirits, looking at the BIG HEXAGONAL STRUCTURE: the Oscillator.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: We'll go in there and we'll hit that oscillator with everything we got.

Speaker: admiral ackbar
Dialogue: They have defensive shields that our ships cannot penetrate.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We disable the shields.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I can do it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I like this guy.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I can disable the shields. But I have to be there, on the planet--

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We'll get you there.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han, how?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: If I told you, you wouldn't like it.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: So we disable the shields, take out the oscillator and we blow up their big gun. All right. Let's go! And everyone splits.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Chewie, check that donal capitator. Come on. Let's go. -- Finn, be careful with those - they're explosives.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Now you tell me?

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: No matter how much we fought, I've always hated watching you leave. Han looks over, there's Leia.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That's what I did it. So you'd miss me. She laughs, moves up close to him.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: I did miss you. He looks at her, says sweetly, out of the blue:

Speaker: han
Dialogue: It wasn't all bad, was it? Huh? Some of it was...good.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: ... Pretty good.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Some things never change.

Speaker: stormtrooper
Dialogue: Sir, sensors triggered in hangar

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: She's just beginning to test her powers. The longer it takes to find her, the more dangerous she becomes. Kylo exits.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: How are we getting in?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Their shields have a fractional refresh rate. Keeps anything traveling slower than lightspeed from getting through. Finn is suddenly filled with dread.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We're gonna make our landing approach at lightspeed?! Chewie, thinking it's crazy too, says: HELL YES WE ARE!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Alright, Chewie, get ready. Chewie GROANS: he's ready. Han studies the PANEL INDICATORS.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: I get any higher, they'll see us! And the ship DIVES again, back into the trees!

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: Sir, she was not found in hangar 718 but all troops are on alert.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Put every hangar on lock-down. She's going to try to steal a ship to-- Suddenly, Kylo senses something. Something familiar.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: The flooding tunnels are over that ridge. We'll get in that way.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: What was your job when you were based here?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Sanitation.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Sanitation? Then how do you know how to disable the shields?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: People are counting on us! The galaxy is counting on us--!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Solo, we'll figure it out! We'll use the Force!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That's not how the Force works--!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Come on! They follow Finn on the snowy hike. On the horizon, THE

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Report.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The longer we're here, less luck we're going to have. The shields?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I have an idea about that. Han and Chewie follow Finn.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Remember me?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Not anymore. The name's Finn, and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Bring it down. Bring it down.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Follow me. Finn SMILES as we CUT TO:

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: You want me to blast that bucket off your head? Lower the shields.

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: You're making a big mistake.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Do it. Chewie MOAN/TALKS. Phasma hits a few more buttons -- the controls BEEP-CLICK. "SHIELDS DISABLE INITIATE". Eyes on

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Don't worry kid, we won't leave here without her. The controls BEEP-CLICK. "SHIELDS DISABLED".

Speaker: captain phasma
Dialogue: You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: I disagree. What do we do with her?

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Is there a garbage chute? Trash compactor?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Yeah, there is...

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: General, their shields are down!

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Han did it! Send them in!

Speaker: admiral statura
Dialogue: Give Poe full authorization to attack.

Speaker: gulch
Dialogue: Black Leader, go to sub-lights. On your call.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Roger, base -- red squad, blue squad, take my lead.

Speaker: yolo ziff
Dialogue: Dropping out of lightspeed.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Almost in range! Hit the target dead center, as many runs as we can get!

Speaker: snap
Dialogue: Approaching target.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Dispatch all squadrons...

Speaker: colonel datoo
Dialogue: Yes, General.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Let's light it up!  DIVE BOMBING THE OSCILLATOR, HITTING IT DEAD CENTER IN QUICK  SUCCESSION!  INT. X-WING - DAY

Speaker: ello asty
Dialogue: But no damage! Jess reacts.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Yeah, we gotta keep hitting it! Another bombing run! Remember, when that sun is gone, that weapon will be ready to fire! But as long as there's light, we got a chance.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Guys, we got a lot of company!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We'll use the charges to blow that blast door. I'll go in and draw fire, but I'm gonna need cover.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: You sure you're up for this?

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Hell no -- I'll go in find and try to find Rey --  -- The troopers'll be on our tail. We have to be ready for that. There's an access tunnel that'll leads -- (Han starts pointing with his chin to

Speaker: admiral ackbar
Dialogue: The Oscillator's still standing.

Speaker: officer
Dialogue: X-wings coming back for another round of attacks!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Are you all right?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Good.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: What happened -- did he hurt you?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Finn. What are you doing here?!

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: We came back for you. She is speechless -- this is all she's ever wanted anyone to do. Chewie TALKS -- and Rey's eyes nearly tear up.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: ... That it was your idea. Finn awkwardly smiles. It's his nature. They embrace.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: How did you get away?

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Escape now. Hug later.

Speaker: snap
Dialogue: I got one behind me. See it?

Speaker: jess
Dialogue: Yeah, I'm on it!

Speaker: jess
Dialogue: Furillo's been hit!

Speaker: snap
Dialogue: Watch out for ground fire!

Speaker: han
Dialogue: They're in trouble. We can't leave.  My friend here has a bag full of explosives. Let's use 'em.

Speaker: vober dand
Dialogue: Two more X-wings down. That's half our fleet destroyed.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That girl knows her stuff.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: We'll set the charges at every other column. He GROAN/TALKS to Han, who looks around, reconsiders.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Find them. They rush past him. Kylo Ren turns slowly, and HEADS DOWN.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Ben! The name ECHOES as Kylo Ren STOPS, far across the vast catwalk. He turns.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Han Solo. I've been waiting for this day for a long time. Finn and Rey make their way into the space, opening a HATCH that allows A BEAM OF PRECIOUS SUNLIGHT to stream down like a spotlight on Han and his son. Finn and Rey get to a railing and look down. They can SEE and HEAR Han and Kylo Ren on the catwalk below.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Take off that mask. You don't need it.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: What do you think you'll see if I do? Han moves toward Kylo Ren.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: The face of my son. Kylo TAKES OFF HIS MASK. Han is JOLTED -- seeing the face of his son for the first time as a man.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish, like his father. So I destroyed him.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: That's what Snoke wants you to believe but it's not true. My son is alive. SEVERAL LEVELS BELOW them, CHEWIE comes to the rail to watch.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: No. The Supreme Leader is wise. UP ABOVE, Finn, Chewie and Rey watch, rapt. Stormtroopers dot the perimeter of the structure, watching the scene. ON THE BRIDGE, Han moves closer, stern:

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Snoke is using you for your power. When he gets what he wants, he'll crush you -- you know it's true. Kylo hesitates. Somehow, he does know it.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: It's too late.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: No it's not. Leave here with me. Come home. We miss you. For the first time, Kylo Ren seems truly conflicted. Tears flood his stoic eyes...

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do it. Will you help me? Han hears his son's voice again, pained and vulnerable.

Speaker: han
Dialogue: Yes. Anything. Kylo Ren unholsters his lightsaber and SLOWLY EXTENDS IT to Han, within a foot of Han's chest. Han almost can't believe it. The moment seems to last forever. And just then, the LAST BEAM OF SUNLIGHT streaming through the open hatch

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: Thank you. ABOVE, Finn and Rey GASP -- SCREAM --

Speaker: admiral ackbar
Dialogue: The Oscillator's been damaged but is still functional. COMMODORE META reacts.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: The Falcon's this way. Finn and Rey, overcome with emotion, race through the snowy forest -- until Finn SLOWS AND STOPS. Rey stops too, both out of breath. They look at each other. They both know: they can't run.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: We're not done yet.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: You're a monster!

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: It's just us now. Han Solo can't save you. After a beat, Rey moves forward with the blaster -- AIMS IT! Kylo Ren RAISES A HAND -- Rey struggles under his FORCE POWER -- she can't fire -- he strains too, especially with the WOUND Chewie inflicted. Kylo Ren GESTURES POWERFULLY -- Rey's BLASTER FLIES OUT OF HER HAND -- another GESTURE and Rey FLIES BACK and SLAMS INTO A TREE thirty feet away! She drops -- LANDS HARD in the snow. Dazed, hurt.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Rey! Rey! Rey... Rey... Oh no. Oh no no no... Finn turns to her, afraid and concerned. But the SOUND OF KYLO REN'S LIGHTSABER moving makes Finn TURN BACK TO KYLO REN, lit by the glowing YELLOW AND RED BLADE.

Speaker: finn
Dialogue: Come get it. Despite his fear, Finn raises his blade in welcome. Kylo Ren CHARGES at him - Finn terrified -- Kylo Ren LUNGES but Finn DEFLECTS Ren's SPARK-SPITTING blade! Kylo Ren TURNS, ATTACKS, CUTS -- amazingly Finn BLOCKS, COUNTER-ATTACKS -- clearly IMPRESSES KYLO REN, who only enjoys this challenge more! Rey RECOVERS, gets her bearings. Her eyes focus on the two men fighting, through the trees. Kylo Ren is obviously hampered by his wound, yet he attacks with a primal SAVAGERY -- Finn BLOCKS, turning DEFENSIVE moves into OFFENSIVE ones. And he ACTUALLY GETS A HIT IN! LUKE'S SABER GRAZING KYLO REN'S ARM! Kylo MOVES BACK -- wounded, but more enraged than weakened. Kylo Ren CHARGES AGAIN -- their WEAPONS POUND, SPARKS FLY, their blades LOCK, the men are CLOSE, LIT BY the powerful, CRASHING sabers: And Kylo Ren PUSHES FINN BACK, attacks with pure ferocity -- Finn is stunned -- unprepared for this fierceness. Rey sees this -- Kylo Ren unleashes a MERCILESS SERIES OF BLOWS, pushing Finn further and further back until he loses balance.

Speaker: niv lek
Dialogue: We just lost R-1!

Speaker: jess
Dialogue: We're overwhelmed! What do we do? It isn't working! Another pilot looks down -- SEES THE EXPLOSION -- coming from the OSCILLATOR. Relatively small, it's an opening:

Speaker: yolo ziff
Dialogue: Black Leader, there's a brand new hole in that oscillator. Looks like our friends got in!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Red Four! Red Six! Cover us!

Speaker: ello asty
Dialogue: Roger!

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Everybody else, hit the target hard! Give it everything you got! And the X-WINGS DIVE and BLAST the OSCILLATOR --

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: I need some help here! I need some help!

Speaker: jess
Dialogue: Watch out!

Speaker: ello asty
Dialogue: I'm hit! The alien pilot's X-wing is blasted to pieces.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: All teams - I'm going in! Pull up and cover me!

Speaker: niv lek
Dialogue: Copy that, Black Leader! Good luck, Poe! The trailing X-wings peel off as Poe's black fighter darts into the fiery breach.

Speaker: starkiller technician
Dialogue: Weapon at full capacity in thirty seconds.

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: Prepare to fire.

Speaker: kylo ren
Dialogue: You need a teacher! I can show you the ways of the Force!

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: The Force. Rey closes her eyes for a long beat. When Rey opens them, she is centered, fortified, and she POUNDS BACK, SINGLE HANDED SWIPES, hitting Ren's gnarly, spitting saber with incredible FORCE. It's so fast now, so furious, that Kylo Ren FALLS BACK -- She ATTACKS HARDER! Ren gets up again but she HITS HIS SABER'S HILT -- HIS BLADE GOES FLYING OFF, TUMBLING INTO THE SNOW -- and she SLASHES

Speaker: colonel datoo
Dialogue: Lieutenant, get back to your station!

Speaker: young technician
Dialogue: Just look. We won't survive -- even Hux has gone! As he hurries off, WE HEAR:

Speaker: general hux
Dialogue: The fuel cells have ruptured. The collapse of the planet has begun. Snoke takes this in. Furious, desolate... knowing.

Speaker: snoke
Dialogue: Leave the base at once and come to me with Kylo Ren.

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: Finn! Finn... Tears come to her eyes as she lifts him, holds his lifeless body in her arms. Snow flurries around them as she cries, holding this boy who she just met, who she already adores. They are left here to die -- nearby MORE TREES DROP as the planet continues to COLLAPSE. And just as it seems like all is lost... Her wet eyes look up to see:

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: All teams! I got eyes on them!

Speaker: snap
Dialogue: Yes! The X-wings ROAR OFF, skyward as the MUSIC SOARS, the PLANET IMPLODES -- THE SUNLIGHT IT CONTAINS BURSTS FORTH, and as we get further and further distance from what was Starkiller Base, we witness the REBIRTH OF A SUN. Light restored to a corner of the galaxy. The Millennium Falcon and the X-wings RIP THROUGH SPACE, headed home.

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Our job's done here. Let's go home!

Speaker: medic
Dialogue: Easy, easy. He's hurt. We've got a heartbeat. Rey walks down the ramp and sees, for the first time, Leia. C-3PO and BB-8 behind her. The crowds are cheering. Rey is so sad for Leia, so sorry. The two women move for each other. And Leia takes Rey's face in her hands. Despite her heartbreak, she is grateful. She embraces Rey. A mother's embrace. Rey cries, too, in this emotional first meeting.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Tell me. Rey stands with Leia, Poe C-3PO, BB-8 and a handful of Resistance Officers. Suddenly R2-D2 PROJECTS A HOLOGRAM! A

Speaker: poe
Dialogue: Yeah, all right, buddy, hold on -- Poe runs over -- removes the ancient data device that Lor San Tekka had given him from a base computer. He inserts it back inside BB-8, who then PROJECTS HIS MAP -- which he SHRINKS DOWN TO SIZE -- and the two droids MOVE SLIGHTLY --

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: -- Luke -- Suddenly there are CHEERS AND EMBRACES. C-3PO leans down to R2-D2 and says, quietly, sweetly:

Speaker: rey
Dialogue: We'll see each other again. I believe that. Thank you, my friend.

Speaker: leia
Dialogue: Rey. Rey turns around.
